tool_description: Turning Natural Language Texts into Knowledge Graphs
name: Theresa
title: Theresa

api_list.name: Entity Extraction
api_list.description: Given an arbitrary text corpus (in English or Chinese), this endpoint performs the entity extraction and entity linking and outputs a list of nodes and a list of links that specify how the nodes are connected, i.e. the text is transformed to a knowledge graph
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://theresa3.p.rapidapi.com/entityExtraction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theresa3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://theresa3.p.rapidapi.com/entityExtraction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theresa3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
